posts.message:
Dear Geeks,
I am forming a new team from scratch in a company I consult with. 

I am looking for the following skills:

1. Web devs, preferably with CMS skills like DNN or Umbraco

2. Python Devs 

3.Windows Phone,  Android, iOS and Blackberry Devs

The following skills/attributes will be appreciated:

1. Candidates who take pride in being geeks, like learning, like challenges and generally have fun at work even when the going gets tough.

2. Candidates who work on multiple platforms and have their own technical pet peeves.

3. People who already practice or would like to practice, automated unit testing, continuous integration, TDD and agile process.

The working environment is friendly and comfortable. We have some challenges so I expect the teams to work with me to face these challenges. I expect the candidates to bring their experiences to the table, to tackle challenges and come up with innovative solutions.

We aim at having a maximum working day of 8 hours with 6 full hours of productivity. Then you go home and get a life.

All candidates will be expected to present some knowledge sharing sessions, they will have a quarterly development plan and be expected to learn and teach others.

I expect to see leadership within every individual in the team.

The environement will be heterogenous i.e. Linux (at least 3 distros), Windows (8, 2012, 2008, 7), Unix and Android 

If this sounds interesting to you send me ur resume

msamy@sufigeeks.org

Nokia invites all developers with good J2ME knowledge to join the Nokia App Camp. The camps are organized jointly with major Nokia Developer partners.

 Developers will spend 3 full weeks in an environment full of learning and fun. They will have intensive ASHA training and will start in few days developing their own Apps. Nokia will advise on the most promising and simple Apps to be developed. Throughout the 3 weeks, developers will get full support to finish their Apps and publish it to Nokia Store.

 The program will run simaultaneously in more than one location and will be repeated till the end of 2013.

 Program Duration: 3 weeks

 1st Wave will be limited to 20 developers. Later waves will accomodate more.

Start date: 9 June 2013

Please send all questions to mohamed.hantirah@nokia.com
http://eventtus.com/event/51a9e0968c5b94f012000022
